html:
10.7.22  12:38 am   the skit was 10/10, but it really leaves me wondering:
could the friends eat all the forks in the end?

      not on my watch. eating forks is presumably dangerous and uncomfortable

10.7.22  12:30 am   are you doing some kind of 10:1 music video to 'anything video' schedule?

     no

     probably not, judging by your content philosophy...

      according to my philosophy i would like to do them equally, and i would also prefer it to be a regular pattern, just because it's difficult for me to handle the uncertainty

10.7.22  12:26 am   I think something can be silly and serious at the same time, and your works are prime examples of those. would you agree?

      i think silliness is very serious, and of course seriousness is very silly. and the reason i think that's hilarious is because that's not what they're supposed to be

10.7.22  12:15 am   Do you think that there is a Bill Wurtz type of genre that you made?

      maybe

10.7.22  12:05 am   Are the two friends actually friends?

      i believe so

10.6.22  11:52 pm   why did you title your latest video "two friends at the beach" when the characters spend most of the video away from the beach? (i would also like to clarify the tone of the question: it's not meant to sound accusatory, just curious. i loved the video)

      it's like a bait-and-switch

10.6.22  11:38 pm   how many spirits have you trapped in that jar you call your head

      i'm sure they're all in here somewhere

10.6.22  10:59 pm   We're you hungry when you made two people on a beach?

     no. well, probably yes, for some of the time

     I was hungry watching two people on a beach. Maybe it's because I am cooking or smth idk.

10.6.22  10:37 pm   Does friendship have a color?

      it's all the colors

10.6.22  10:06 pm   what does the selection process for a non-song video look like? do you have some sort of list to pick from,

     yes

      or do you just "know" what one needs to be made?

      in the best case, i already know. then i don't have to worry about selection

10.6.22  9:59 pm   how do you create the 3d scribbles above character's heads? is it like normal scribbling but 3d?

      at some point i wrote a script that takes all the points of a 2d squiggle, determines what plane they exist on, and then randomizes their depth in the 3rd relative dimension, within a range comparable to the size of the plane. to use this feature i just perform a normal squiggle on 2D, then press the button. i don't remember exactly how it works

10.6.22  9:30 pm   What part of the guitar is the tastiest?

      the sound

10.6.22  9:28 pm   what is your favorite word?

     using different words together, that's the only thing that does it for me anymore

      also why are you so awesome i love your music and ur whole brand(idk what other word to put) so much

     holy smokes, you are very friendly

10.6.22  9:16 pm   does your car have a "GO SOMEWHERE" button?

      no, mine still has a steering wheel

10.6.22  9:14 pm   hey bill i apologize for my previous questions, looking back they were pretty dumb. on that topic, what led you to make "2 friends on the beach"?

      i've wanted to do videos in that format for several years now, and i've been writing a lot of it. my level of desire for it became too intense to ignore, and my level of graphics production skills is just starting to approach the neighborhood of what it takes to stay afloat and on pace in that arena

10.6.22  9:13 pm   when does a few things become several things?

      around the 4th or 5th thing

10.6.22  9:05 pm   two friends chillin on a roof. Why wont they order desert....???

      because they only started the main course 7 seconds ago

10.6.22  9:03 pm   Hey Bill! Love your latest skit! I wanted to ask, what would you say, personally, is the hardest part of the 3D animation process for you?

      basically the whole game with 3D is to avoid the infinite dizziness that penetrates your soul, over and over again, as you realize how infinitely infinite everything is and goes. you could have a thousand memos taped all over your body, telling yourself of the importance and availability of finity and limits. and yet, still, multitple times a minute, you're still bombarded with the vast infinities that lurk around every corner, everywhere throughout our world

10.6.22  8:48 pm   Has existence been weird to you?

     yes

      Why?

      i'm not sure, but, i have to admit i'd probably request that anyway if i could

10.6.22  8:44 pm   do you have a long list of ideas for skits like you do with songs?

      yes

10.6.22  8:40 pm   why is the restaurant shady? 

      i'm not sure. my best guess is it was a polar contrast to the open and non-shadyness of the driving scene before that

10.6.22  8:31 pm   Hey Bill, I have a theory. what if the iPhone power block and mechanical pencil are acting out a conversation between the 2 friends on the beach from your latest video
Can you give me a plausibility rating from 1%-108% on that

      there is 100% plausibility that they are acting out dialogue written by the exact same person who wrote the dialogue for the other characters. so therefore, everyone involved is the same person because it's techically only 1 person

10.6.22  8:28 pm   so do skits go through songgen?  are skits placed among all the songs you have listed?  or do you have separate lists for skits and songs?  or do you just say "fuck it, i'm making a skit this time"?

      i have a separate list, and they do often share the same generation and selection process

10.6.22  8:28 pm   the license plate of the car in 2 friends at the beach says two2to. would this be an easter egg?

      no, it's just a reference to "2" which is the number of characters and also in the title

10.6.22  8:22 pm   love the latest video, especially how expressive and natural the dialogue is. do you have any background in acting?

      only with what i've written and produced myself

10.6.22  8:19 pm   Are the 2 friends from "2 friends on the beach" the same 2 characters at the start of "i'm a huge gamer most of the time"?

      it certainly may seem like it, until you notice that character 2 in 'gamer' is slightly shorter than the other chracter, and has a slightly higher voice. the 2 characters in 2 friends on the beach are certainly exactly the same height, and in most cases their voices are the same

10.6.22  8:15 pm   Why are the 2 friends on the beach?

      that's a vehicle for exploring dialogue and/or scenery

10.6.22  8:15 pm   What's your favorite meme, if you have one

      earth

10.6.22  8:14 pm   What is your favorite video you have ever created?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

10.6.22  8:12 pm   sometimes i will take a nap in the afternoon, and wake up later thinking it's the morning except it's not and it's always such a surreal experience and i always end up needing a reality check from someone.

wat do i do?

      set your clock to 24-hour mode

10.6.22  8:07 pm   i'm really interested in what the script for "2 friends on the beach" looks like, can i just maybe have a look?

      sure

10.6.22  8:00 pm   when was outside written

      the title/chorus (the first 2 or 4 bars of the chorus) were written on march 12, 2017. the rest of the song was written in august 2017

10.6.22  8:00 pm   Do you think the 2 friends will eventually go into the lobster section at some point in the future?

      we'll get in that room, for sure. although i can promise you there's no lobsters anywhere in the building yet. and in fact, there's no longer any need for any lobsters there, because i was able to accomplish what i was going for, with no lobsters

10.6.22  7:54 pm   i noticed under your track page that there are some jazz standards from the real book. would you consider your music to be influenced by specific songs, or did that notion of learning jazz contribute to your overall style of composing?

      the real book studies i did were not about learning jazz.......... it was actually more about learning pop. and the realization that most of that book is actually pop. at leat the best parts of the book are

10.6.22  7:46 pm   do you want to go to the beach?

      no

10.6.22  7:46 pm   What is your inspiration for the style of your videos?

      the real world............... whatever that may be

10.6.22  4:26 pm   how do you stay both creative and grounded?

      sometimes it's impossible, but that's when it's time to remember the good news, which is that it's inevitable

10.6.22  10:49 am   what was the inspiration for the time mop music video? 

      the time mop instrumental piece that i produced 5 years earlier. and the challenge of doing a music video for an entirely instrumental song.

10.6.22  10:26 am   when will there be a 13th month

      when all the months have 28 days and one month has 29

10.6.22  10:02 am   Can you juggle?

      just about

10.5.22  10:35 pm   I play the bass clarinet, clarinet, Eb clarinet, and bassoon, in about 10 different ensembles. Too much?

      on a typical day, do you find that the clock or calendar is making you angry

10.5.22  4:58 pm   I just overheard a percussionist turn down a gig offered by someone who was some sort of a talent scout for a really prestigious ensemble. The guy said that joining that ensemble was his dream, but that he needed to learn more and improve his skills by continuing to attend music school, and that he planned to join the ensemble eight years from now. Did he make the right decision, or did I just witness someone make the mistake of his life?

      from the way you told the story, it sounds like a fairly outrageously idiotic plan. almost like studying friendship in school before accepting any real friends. but there may be more to the story that we don't know

10.5.22  4:05 pm   does your new video take place on the beach

      the title takes place on the beach

10.5.22  9:19 am   Bill, I'm still waiting on steve

      i wonder what steve is waiting on

10.5.22  4:42 am   what do you think of cats

      too good

10.5.22  4:25 am   in your opinion, what's your funkiest song?

      i don't have any funky songs

10.5.22  3:10 am   is Ronald a good name

      almost

10.4.22  11:47 pm   I forgot. Can you help me remember?

      sure

10.4.22  10:42 pm   is it bad that im so obsessed with creating the tools to create rather than just creating?

     it's good and bad at the same time

     how can i get out of the "make productivity system" funk and into the "go off on making stuff" groove

      for the obsessed type of person, it's possible that the only way through this is to get yourself so buried that you face some kind of breakdown. but it's gonna be fine

10.4.22  9:41 pm   sometimes i get a good idea in the bath but i cant write it down because i have soapy hands. what do i do?

      play out an imaginary quiz game show in your mind, where contestants take turns quizzing each other about trivial details about the idea. how many words it has. how many letters it has. etc
